CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Third Coast Bancshares Inc is a bank holding company. It focuses on providing commercial banking solutions to small and medium-sized businesses and professionals with operations in its markets. The bank operates eleven branches in the Greater Houston, Dallas-Fort Worth, and Austin-San Antonio markets, and one branch in Detroit, Texas.

value.name: Vicki Alexander
value.title: Executive VP, Chief Operations & Risk Officer
